The way I see something before I draw is shapes. And then I draw the shapes in a broken line way
The lines in my work are almost all free floating but as the design moves closer to the center of the paper, the lines are connected by insinuation
I’m probably causing more confusion than explaination
I've done 108 auditions in the last 30 days. 69 (giggity) were listened to. 5 were accepted. Not the greatest turnover rate lol.
Only two ended up giving me "feedback" which amounts to "Thanks for your audition, but we've decided to go with another voice."
I try to get one a one in ten ratio of listening to acceptance.
and thats where depression sets in for me
7% listen to accept ratio is a wee bit on the low side.
It looks better than the 5 in 108 stat though lol.
see if someone told me thanks for the try but we decided to choose someone else that would set me into non motivation mode
I refuse to count the ones that don't even give my audition a listen. It happens too much, and there's not much of anything I can do.
It is hard when you get that
But you have to force yourself. Which im...not good at admittedly
Eh. That's not too bad. Some clients can be straight up toxic.
My favorite story is from one lady who wrote a 5 page dissertation on how terrible I was for my audition.
I stopped reading after she mentioned how it was "painfully obvious that I was a French Canadian and that (I) needed to stop trying to sound like an American."
Even if someone did something terrible to me, im not sure i'd exert the effort on 5 pages of text
Ah the classic "no idea what im talkin about"
Next on “Why my grandchildren don’t visit”...
It was kinda early on in my career, and I tell you what, the first two pages before I got to that were fucking soul crushing.
But after I read it, I was like, oh, okay. Fuck this lady, she has no bearing on the word "Quality".
the fact that they wrote 5 pages of bullshit says more about THEM than it says about you, dadro.
You’re speech reminds me of the horns of a steer: a point here and there, but a whole lot of bull in between
Not even. I just deleted her messages, blocked her account, and laughed it off.
